alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Howard; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 7:39PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Buffalo, southeastern Sherman and southwestern Howard Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 738 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pleasanton, or 21 miles north of Kearney, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hazard around 750 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ravenna, Rockville, Ashton and Boelus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
